document_data.name: Shadow Bolt
document_data.mainbody: '''''Shadow bolt''''', known also as '''''shadow burst''''', was an [[evocation]] [[spell]] used by [[wizard]]s.{{Cite dragon/200/The Wizards Three: Once more the three|23}}
document_data.Effects: This spell created a burst of gray shadow force that the caster shot from their hands toward a target. The ''shadow bolt'' never missed if the caster could see the target when the spell was cast. A target struck by the bolt experienced wracking pain, making it more difficult for them to perform normal functions.
document_data.Components: This spell required only [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[Somatic component|somatic]] components to cast.
